alert.note: Alert for Ellis; Kaufman (Texas) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Flood Warning issued October 28 at 7:50PM CDT until October 31 at 4:32AM CDT by NWS Dallas-Fort Worth
info.description: ...The Flood Warning is extended for the following rivers in Texas... Trinity River Near Rosser affecting Kaufman and Ellis Counties. ...FLOOD WARNING NOW IN EFFECT UNTIL EARLY TUESDAY MORNING... * WHAT...Minor flooding is occurring and moderate flooding is forecast. * WHERE...Trinity River near Rosser. * WHEN...Until early Tuesday morning. * IMPACTS...At 38.0 feet, Widespread flooding is possible on farm and ranch lands near the river. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 7:30 PM CDT Saturday the stage was 34.1 feet. - Bankfull stage is 31.0 feet. - Flood stage is 31.0 feet. - Forecast...The river is expected to rise to a crest of 37.6 feet tomorrow evening. It will then fall below flood stage Monday afternoon. &&
info.instruction: Do not drive cars through flooded areas. Caution is urged when walking near riverbanks. Additional information is available at www.weather.gov/fwd.
